synopsis: In this enlightening episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir dive into the complexities of work-life balance, sharing their personal experiences and struggles as they navigate the demands of adulthood. They emphasize the importance of self-awareness, mindfulness, and pursuing passions outside of work, while also acknowledging the societal pressures that can complicate our relationships with ourselves and our careers.
quotes: The point is to just share what we've learned through our journeys and talk to each other.
Are you satisfied with your life, and do you feel whole at the end of the day?
What would love have me do today?
You can’t control the world; people are going to say what they want.
Life happens between the work hard and play hard.
It's not about number of hours; you can burn out working 50 hours a week.
When you’re feeling overwhelmed, maybe the answer is to stay in and order food.
If you’re working so much, you stop feeding your soul.
Social media is just white noise; it’s not even relaxing.
I was waking up thinking about work; it was like an obsession.
